txt.en: 'You have come a great way, [placeholder], to bring your message to the Dúnedain. Golodir and I will inform the rest of our kin here in Angmar, and we will make haste to join the Grey Company.\n\n'You should return now to Master Elrond in Rivendell, that he may be told of your errand's success.'

'You have done quite well, [placeholder]. The Grey Company assembles with as much haste as can be taken, and they will ride to Aragorn in the wide southern lands.

'Whatever dangers have befallen him, we must believe the Dúnedain will reach him in time.

'If you desire to aid the Grey Company and Aragorn further, you may ride with them. I will tell you when all is made ready. Until that day, [placeholder], go in peace and keep still the safety of these lands. The way south will be dangerous.'
'Master Elrond will be pleased to know of your success in this errand.'
Chapter 9: The Gathering of the Grey Company
You have spoken with each of the Rangers whose names Master Elrond provided and should report now to the Elf-lord of your success.
Master Elrond is in the library of his house, in Rivendell.\n\nYou have brought word of the Grey Company's need to the Rangers spoken of by Master Elrond and should return now to him.
